txt.en: Rescue the miners and defuse the powder kegs before the cave collapses completely!
'Goblins must have planted those powder kegs!'
You have been tasked with rescuing miners from the partially collapsed cave of Mesem-gairu.
Rescue the miners and defuse the powder kegs before the cave collapses completely!

'We thank you for the rescue. One minute, we were mining crystals, and the next, the cavern shook and starting collapsing all around us. It would seem that goblins had entered the caverns before us, and lined the tunnels with hidden powder kegs. I am just glad that only a couple of the powder kegs detonated!'
Exit the cavern after rescuing the miners and defusing the powder kegs!
<rgb=#FF0000>Rescue the miners and defuse the powder kegs before the cave collapses completely!</rgb>
